entry.title: Papaya SOS Marmalade
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: All Purpose Balm
Price: 30.00

Skin rehab in a vital, soothe-all marmalade balm. Rescue your skin with this nourishing cocktail of coconut, hemp, chia, grapefruit oil & fermented papaya that helps to hasten the delivery of essential antioxidants & vitamins to the skin. An ultra-repairing formula to soothe any little abrasions, skin freakouts, dryness, insect bites or scars, this wonder balm melts into skin and is useful to heal + protect.

Designed for face + hands + feet + body + hair. An all-in-one remedy rich in zinc, magnesium & potassium. Calendula calms inflammation to aid in your skin’s healing, while chia adds omegas. Use a lot or a little, ideal for travel and all of life’s adventures, big & small.

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

• 1 oz / 30 g

Ingredients

caprylic/capric triglyceride, sweet almond (prunis amygdalus dulcis) oil, coconut (cocos nucifera) oil, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, mango (mangifera indica) seed butter, jojoba (simmondsia chinensis) seed oil, hemp (cannabis sativa) seed oil, shea (butyrospermum parkii) butter, vegetable squalane, tocopherol (vitamin e), buriti (mauritia flexuosa) fruit oil, papaya (carica papaya) fermented extract, chia (salvia hispanica) seed oil, grapefruit (citrus grandis) seed extract, olive (olea europaea) fruit oil, glycerin, ascorbic acid, calendula (calendula officinalis) flower extract.

Directions

Apply to improve, protect lips, hands, scars, cuticles, heels, hair, insect bites, scrapes, bruises or any dry skin. Rub until the product has fully absorbed. Also gently removes makeup.

entry.title: RESTORE Healing Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Doctor Rogers
Type: Facial Moisturizer
Price: 15.00 - 80.00 (4 variants)

Soothe and heal dry, damaged skin, lips and nails with the long lasting hydration and protection of Doctor Rogers RESTORE™ Healing Balm. RESTORE™ has been clinically tested to reduce irritation and aid in the healing of irritated skin.

Perfectly blended with only the purest plant-based ingredients proven to support the skin’s natural healing process.

Uses: Chapped lips, dry nails & cuticles, eczema, post-procedure healing such as skin surgery, lasering, and tattoos, cuts & scrapes, burns, diaper cream, to gloss lips, style eyebrows, tame flyaways and any other dry/damaged areas in need of healing!

• Made in the USA with FDA clearance using 3 sustainably grown, plant-based ingredients.

• Free of petroleum, lanolin, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, fragrance and common allergens

• Safe for sensitive and injured skin

• Vegan and cruelty-free

Ingredients

Glycerin, Castor Oil, Castor Wax.

Directions

Apply as often as needed to dry or damaged skin to protect and promote healing.

entry.title: Cuticle Repair Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: French Girl Organics
Type: Nail and Cuticle
Price: 20.00

An enriching blend of dynamic extracts and essential oils to improve the health of nails and cuticles.

• 100% Plant Ingredients / 80-100% Organic

• 100% Vegan Friendly

• 9ml Roll On

Ingredients

Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil* Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil* Ricinus Communis (Castor) Oil* Argania Spinosa (Argan) Oil* Rosa Mosqueta (Rosehip) Oil* Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Oil* Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Oil* Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Oil* Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Oil, Hippophae (Sea Buckthorn)* Essential Oils of Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary)* Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium)*, Citrus Limonum (Lemon) *Certified OrganIc/Wildcrafted

Directions

Apply to nails and cuticles as desired.

entry.title: More & More Cuticle Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: treat collection
Type: Nail and Cuticle
Price: 20.00

Formulated without Toluene, DBP, Camphor, Formaldehyde or Formaldehyde Resin.

A deeply nourishing oil enriched with Argan + Almond oil as well as Vitamins A, C and E to promote healthy cuticles.

• Made in the USA

• Cruelty free

• Suitable for vegans

• 15 ml

Ingredients

Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower Seed) Oil, Argana Spinoa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenyl Riacetate, Tocopherol, Retinyl Palmitate, Ethyl Acetate, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Seed Extract, Dimethyl Oxobenzo Dioxasilane

Directions

Apply a small amount onto the cuticle and nail bed as often as needed.

entry.title: Ultimate Multi-Purpose Coconut Oil Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: everbelle
Type: All Purpose Balm
Price: 19.00 - 38.00 (2 variants)

The creators of everbelle set out to combine the luxurious and organic attitude of California, which resulted in the creation of a 100% natural body balm that can be used anywhere and everywhere! Their ultimate body balm epitomizes the perfect, all-around product for people on the go who love multi-use products. A dollop will moisturize your entire body. A dab will create shiny hair. Just a bit will smooth your lips, rejuvenate tired feet, or smooth those over worked hands + cuticles!

The Ultimate Body Balm imparts moisture to your skin using the finest ingredients nature has to offer. This fast-absorbing balm ensures that your skin stays hydrated day and night.

Great for: Body, hands, knees, elbows, feet, legs, elbows, lips, flyaway hair, anywhere your heart desires!

• Available in 2 oz and 4 oz formats

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

Ingredients

cocos nucifera (organic virgin coconut) oil, theobroma cacao (organic cocoa butter), cera alba (organic beeswax), rosa mosqueta (rosehip) seed oil-organic, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil, pelargonium graveolens (geranium) essential oil, aniba roseodora (rosewood) essential oil, cananga odorata var genuina (ylang ylang II) essential oil

Directions

Dip into into the everbelle goodness and rub it between your palms to warm it.

entry.title: Nail + Cuticle Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: FIG+YARROW
Type: Nail and Cuticle
Price: 10.00 - 20.00 (2 variants)

F+Y Nail & Cuticle Salve is a highly nourishing blend of herbs, oils and botanical essences for enhanced strength + appearance of nails.

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

Olea europea (olive) oil*†, Cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil*†, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter*†, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) oil*, Cera alba (beeswax)*, Azadirachta indica (neem) oil*, Equisetum arvense (horsetail)*, Avena sativa (oatstraw)*, Urtica dioica (nettle)*, Rosmarinus officinalia (rosemary)*, Arcticum lappa (burdock) root*, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, essential oils of: Citrus limon (lemon), Lavandula angustifolia (lavender)*, Cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass), Pelargonium graveolens (geranium), Commiphora myrrha (myrrh), Melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree), Daucus carota (carrot seed). *certified organic, †virgin

Directions

Regularly massage small amount into nail and cuticle of both fingers and toes; disburse excess over hands and feet to provide added benefit.

entry.title: Hair + Scalp Tonic
entry.summary:
Vendor: FIG+YARROW
Type: Hair Treatment
Price: 12.00 - 34.00 (2 variants)

F+Y Hair & Scalp Tonic is a wonderfully nourishing, conditioning and stimulating treatment, enhancing quality and appearance of hair and scalp (and beard and 'stache and dome…). As a complete multi-tasker, this product can also be used as a post-shave, skin-soothing moisture serum, nail strengthener as well as an oil cleanser.

Ingredients

oils of: Persea gratissima (avocado) seed*†, Olea europaea (olive)*†, Cannabis sativa (hemp) seed*†, Cocus nucifera (coconut)*†, Argania spinosa (argan)*†, Limnanthes alba (meadowfoam), Azadirachta indica (neem)*; Equisetum arvense (horsetail)*, Avena sativa (oat) straw*, Urtica dioica (stinging nettle) leaf*, Rosemaryinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf*, Arctium lappa (burdock) root*, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, essential oils of: Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary), Lavandula angustifolia (lavender)*, Cananga odorata (ylang ylang), Pimento racemosa (bay rum). *certified organic, †virgin

Directions

Apply and disperse over scalp with dropper; massage in and draw out through length of hair; saturate dry ends. Follow with a steaming towel wrap for deeper penetration; thoroughly shampoo and condition as normal. For persistently dry hair: try adding small amount (using your discretion) to shampoo or conditioner.
